name: Desolate World
overview: What do you get if you mix the game play and in part, the graphics of The Bitmap Brothers classic 'Gods'; a Platformer from 1991, with a futuristic shooter? You'd probably get the "unreleased" Amiga game ' Desolate World '. But is this truly an unreleased game, many of you probably haven't heard of it, but we can tell you this was a demo coverdisk version released as public in a Czech magazine Amiga Review 28!
